local_intent: Ensure white_plate is perceived (or scanned), compute a top grasp, approach and align with tolerance 0.005, set TCP yaw to 0 and verify orientation before pick.
assumptions: white_plate is within reachable workspace and scannable from current camera pose
ComputeGraspPose will store a usable pose at key 'white_plate_grasp' for downstream Pick
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT verify-phase: performs perception fallback, detection, computes the top grasp (same result_key as GLOBAL_BT), executes ApproachAndAlign with specified tolerance and timeout, then sets and verifies TCP orientation prior to the Pick step.
